title: Ep 142: Ask The Pharmacist
itunes:title: Ep 142: Ask The Pharmacist
itunes:subtitle: C.O. Bigelow president and pharmacist Ian Ginsberg answers questions about parabens, sulfates, probiotics, drug tests—and what it's like to run one of New York City's last independent apothecaries. Plus, we discuss Olaplex, French Girl "...
description:
C.O. Bigelow president and pharmacist Ian Ginsberg answers questions about parabens, sulfates, probiotics, drug tests—and what it's like to run one of New York City's last independent apothecaries. Plus, we discuss Olaplex, French Girl "nothingness," and Jenn's sassy AF grandma. 


Want more Fat Mascara?
